text: Highway 1 (Saskatchewan Highway 1), is a highway in Saskatchewan that is part of the Trans-Canada Highway in Canada. The highway in Saskatchewan is about long. Unlike other provinces in Canada, the exit numbers are numbered from east to west (starting at zero from the Manitoba border, and increasing exit numbers as we move west to the Alberta border). The road is also a main link between southern Saskatchewan's cities (like Regina, Saskatchewan) and the main link between Alberta and Manitoba. ==Related pages== *British Columbia Highway 1 *Alberta Highway 1 *Manitoba Highway 1 Category:Trans-Canada Highway
title: Saskatchewan Highway 1
